title: Get in Touch
text: No mobile information will be shared with third parties/affiliates for marketing/promotional purposes. All the above categories exclude text messaging originator opt-in data and consent; this information will not be shared with any third parties.
disclaimer: By providing my phone number to “D&S Cargo”, I agree and acknowledge that “D&S Cargo” may send text messages to my wireless phone number for any purpose. Message and data rates may apply. We will only send one SMS as a reply to you, and you will be able to Opt-out by replying “STOP.
